seedGroups.name: Beaks
seedGroups.description: Beaks are a subset of the shaker group, with seed capsules that split open like a beak when the seeds are ripe. Collect when beaks are open.

species.description: Beaks. These lovely bulbs form a capsule that turns from green to beige-brown, and splits into 3 parts to reveal black seeds. Collect when the beaks open. Like many lily relatives, these are slow from seed. Flowers are charming 6-pointed stars, in pale blue-violet.
